sentences.sContent: a special unit for rehabilitating stroke patients
sentences.sCn: 协助中风患者康复的特殊病房

synos.tran: 使康复；使恢复名誉；使恢复原状
复兴；复权；恢复正常生活

remMethod.val: re + hab(拥有) + ilit + ate → 重新拥有 → 使恢复原状， 修复

trans.tranCn: 恢复地位；使残疾者恢复正常的生活
trans.tranOther: to help someone to live a healthy, useful, or active life again after they have been seriously ill or in prison
